response.original_title: A Mosque for the American Dynamo
response.overview: "A mosque for the american dynamo" is an audiovisual piece of videowork which combines aesthetic and narration tactics of the genres comic, music video and literature.  Based on the short story "We see things differently" by Bruce Sterling, written in the mid 80`s and placed in the first decades of the 21st century, which let us see a economical broken America through the eyes of a mujahideen, who is disguised as an Egyptian reporter covering a story about Tom Boston, a highly social dedicated and famous American rockstar.
response.title: A Mosque for the American Dynamo
